author: Crisis24
title: Syria: Suspected Israeli airstrikes reported in Damascus area late Dec. 28 | Crisis24
text: 28 Dec 2023 | 08:42 PM UTC Syria: Suspected Israeli airstrikes reported in Damascus area late Dec. 28 Syrian air defenses respond to suspected Israeli airstrikes in Damascus area late Dec. 28. Additional cross-border attacks possible. Syrian air defenses have reportedly activated in the vicinity of Damascus amid suspected Israeli airstrikes in the area late Dec. 28. While the Israel Defense Forces (IDF) did not immediately issue a public acknowledgment of the suspected cross-border attack, alleged Israeli airstrikes have regularly targeted bases of Iran-affiliated groups, such as Hizballah, across Syria. Military forces in Syria and northern Israel will almost certainly maintain a heightened security posture over the coming days. Further airstrikes, retaliatory attacks, and exchanges of cross-border fire are possible over the short term. Exercise caution and avoid all military sites in Syria. Heed the instructions of local security forces. If airstrikes, artillery fire, or warning sirens are reported in the general vicinity, take cover in the nearest bomb shelter and remain there until given further instructions by authorities. Tensions between Syria and Israel remain extremely high. Israel has repeatedly expressed concerns about Iranian proxies in southwestern Syria and aims to prevent a major build-up of Iran-backed forces in the region. Since 2017, the IDF has launched hundreds of preemptive strikes in Syria, targeting suspected Hizballah and Iran-led fighters, weapons caches, and supply convoys, primarily in the country's southwestern governorates.

author: Nick Mantas
title: LeSean McCoy doesn‚Äôt think Dak Prescott is mentally tough enough in postseason
text: The criticism of the Dallas Cowboys is constant year-round but ramps up almost yearly around the start of training camp. Former NFL running back and two-time Super Bowl Champion LeSean McCoy has constantly criticized the Cowboys and quarterback Dak Prescott. Recommended Videos During an interview on Fan Duel TV‚Äôs Up & Adams show hosted by Kay Adams, McCoy was asked what he believes stopped Dak Prescott from being able to perform at a high level in the postseason. McCoy answered with a bashing of Prescott‚Äôs mental toughness. 2x SB Champ LeSean McCoy on‚Äî Up & Adams (@UpAndAdamsShow) [#Cowboys]QB Dak Prescott's postseason struggles... üëÄüîä "I don't think he's tough enough... he plays like he don't have that dawg in him." [@CutonDime25] [@heykayadams] [pic.twitter.com/bT2YHKyQYS] [July 25, 2024] Prescott and the rest of the Cowboys started the practice portion of training camp hours after the interview and might get asked for his reaction to McCoy‚Äôs criticism. If that happens, we‚Äôll keep you informed on-air and online with continuous Dallas Cowboys training camp coverage.

title: Aldeone critica Serra Branca e garante bicho "do bolso" para o elenco do Sousa em caso de vit√≥ria | sousa | ge

O presidente do Sousa , Aldeone Abrantes, est√° em polvorosa nas redes sociaise nas r√°dios de Sousa. Isso porque o dirigente n√£o gostou nada que o Serra Branca tenha entrado com uma not√≠cia de infra√ß√£o junto ao Tribunal de Justi√ßa Desportiva de Futebol (TJDF-PB) para que o tribunal possa tomar ci√™ncia da invas√£o de campo de torcedores do Dinossauro no Est√°dio Jos√© Cavalcanti, no √∫ltimo domingo, no jogo do clube sertanejo diante do Nacional de Patos, pelo Campeonato Paraibano Unip√™. Sousa e Serra Branca se enfrentam neste domingo pelo estadual.
1 de 2 Aldeone Abrantes reclamou at√© do treinador do Serra Branca, Ranielle Ribeiro ‚Äî Foto: Reprodu√ß√£o/TV Cabo Branco Aldeone Abrantes reclamou at√© do treinador do Serra Branca, Ranielle Ribeiro ‚Äî Foto: Reprodu√ß√£o/TV Cabo Branco
Nas redes sociais, o mandat√°rio do Sousa insinuou que o Serra Branca est√° com medo de jogar no Est√°dio Mariz√£o, onde o clube tem um grande aproveitamento h√° alguns anos, e que possa estar fazendo o "jogo de algu√©m". Ele ainda disse que agora √© quest√£o de honra vencer o duelo entre os dois clubes, que acontece neste domingo, no Mariz√£o.
‚Äî Domingo, o dinheiro que eu tiver no bolso, do meu, para dar de bicho para o meu time ganhar, eu vou dar. Eu quero me vingar no campo. Eles para ganharem do Sousa, v√£o ter que comer a grama ‚Äî disse o dirigente em entrevista √† R√°dio Progresso, de Sousa.
2 de 2 Aldeone Abrantes em suas redes sociais. Sobrou at√© para o t√©cnico do Serra Branca, Ranielle Ribeiro ‚Äî Foto: Reprodu√ß√£o / X Aldeone Abrantes em suas redes sociais. Sobrou at√© para o t√©cnico do Serra Branca, Ranielle Ribeiro ‚Äî Foto: Reprodu√ß√£o / X
Nas redes sociais, o dirigente tamb√©m disparou contra a diretoria do Serra Branca e tamb√©m sobrou para o t√©cnico do clube, Ranielle Ribeiro, que disse que o dirigente gosta de deixar o clima tenso antes de todo jogo em Sousa.
O Sousa perdeu na estreia do Campeonato Paraibano Unip√™ para o Nacional de Patos, fora de casa, em Patos. J√° o Serra Branca venceu pela 1¬™ rodada, em Jo√£o Pessoa, ao bater o Treze por 2 a 0, em jogo de mando de campo do Galo da Borborema. author: Sanu Abraham
title: Simone Biles shares glimpse into 'lil different' Christmas celebrations with husband Jonathan Owens
text:
') > -1) { addClass($('.section-container'), 'pill-tag'); } Follow Us Share 0 Discuss 0 Discuss What's your opinion? Simone Biles shares glimpse into 'lil different' Christmas celebrations with husband Jonathan Owens Discuss Now NFL: Los Angeles Rams at Chicago Bears (image credit: IMAGN) Olympic gymnastics champion Simone Biles offered fans a peek into her holiday celebrations with her husband Jonathan Owens. The couple's Christmas plans shifted to accommodate Owens' professional commitments, trading traditional festivities for a hotel stay.
Biles is fresh from her triumphant Paris Olympics campaign with four medals, and Jonathan Owens is deep into the NFL season as a safety for the Chicago Bears . They navigated their first Christmas as a married couple. After completing her 10-week Gold Over America Tour in November, Biles has become a regular presence at Chicago's games.
On Wednesday, Biles shared a photo of their feet as they lay on a hotel bed.
Trending ‚Ä¢
70% Win (110-25-1) 70% Win (110-25-1) 70% Win (110-25-1) Unlock Free tips from our Experts Get Picks Now "Christmas looks a lil different when ya man gotta report to the hotel," Biles captioned. Looking to predict NFL playoff Scenarios? Try our NFL Playoff Predictor for real-time simulations and stay ahead of the game!
Simone Biles x Jonathan Owens (image credit: instagram/simonebiles) In an exclusive interview with Olympics.com on Tuesday, Biles revealed their scaled-down holiday plans.
"Honestly, just the two of us," Biles said. "Nothing crazy. We're going on vacations next year, so we kind of didn't even do a Christmas this year." The couple's adjusted holiday plans follow Biles' remarkable year, which included three gold medals and a silver at the Paris Olympics. Her team's all-around victory received a score of 171.296 points, with additional golds in individual all-around and vault events.
Jonathan Owens and Biles' rituals NFL: Chicago Bears at San Francisco 49ers - Source: Imagn The 11-time Olympic medallist described their pregame traditions to Olympics.com. They sleep separately in hotels before games, maintaining a routine that includes Jonathan Owens' superstitious sideline visit for good luck wishes from his wife.
"He's always looking for me on the sideline to give him, like, good luck vibes and wishes," Biles said. Their connection extends beyond mutual support ‚Äî Owens surprises her with weekly flowers, which she considers her favorite gift above material presents.
"He usually comes up, gives me a kiss goodbye," Biles said. "He's so chill. He's relaxed. And that's also his personality. Not as stressed as me." She added that supporting each other means everything, noting how Owens has become surprisingly knowledgeable about gymnastics.
The Texas native has adapted well to Chicago's winter, attending games in temperatures as low as 17 degrees Fahrenheit. Between events, she maintains their home life, spending quiet days with their dogs and preparing meals when Owens returns from practice.

author: Ece Yildirim,CNBC
title: This quick grammar hack can make you more convincing, research finds
text:
In his latest book,
"Magic Words," Wharton marketing professor Jonah Berger delves into how the specific words and grammar we use directly affect our persuasiveness.
Pulling from his latest research, titled
"How Verb Tense Changes Persuasion," published in January of this year with Grant Packard of York University and Reihane Boghrati of Arizona State University, he argues that making a change as small as choosing present tense verbs over past tense increases persuasiveness.
Berger's research and other emerging studies in the field demonstrate why you should use the present tense if you wish to be more convincing.
Present tense conveys objectivity
The researchers conducted a total of eight studies to find that using present tense when giving your own opinions or experiences makes them seem truer.
Experiences are subjective and a past tense really underlines that subjectivity, Berger said, whereas a present tense makes the experience seem more factual and universal. The present tense implies that the speaker's experience can be generalized, perhaps to the listener themselves, and makes you seem more certain and confident in the claims you are making.
For example, simply saying "That restaurant is great" persuades your audience to think highly of the restaurant more than saying "that restaurant was great."
Money Report
It's also more vivid and immediate
A similar
study published in the latest volume of the Journal of Experimental Social Psychology supports Berger's findings: University of Toronto researchers found that Amazon product reviews that were written in the present tense were viewed by others to be more helpful than those written in the past tense. They found the effect persisted beyond Amazon reviews, as well. Participants were 10% more likely to donate to a charity when the donation proposal was made in the present tense rather than in the past or future tense.
The study argues that the present seems more vivid to us than the past or the future, and this adds to your ability to convince, University of Toronto professor and co-author of the study Sam Maglio
told the University of Toronto Scarborough news.
Writers, and increasingly fiction writers, have long used present tense as a method to increase impact and vividness for the readers. Using present tense to describe events is often employed to make the content of the story seem more immediate and intense, author David Jauss
wrote in Writer's Digest back in 2014.
"We're all writers; we may not write books or novels or plays, but we're writing all the time," Berger told the "
Knowledge at Wharton" podcast in October 2023. "Every day we're writing emails, PowerPoint presentations, and Word documents in a variety of contexts."
DON'T MISS: Want to be smarter and more successful with your money, work & life?
Sign up for our new newsletter!
Get
CNBC's free Warren Buffett Guide to Investing, which distills the billionaire's No. 1 best piece of advice for regular investors, do's and don'ts, and three key investing principles into a clear and simple guidebook.

author: agentboy1
title: EAfc25 Pitch keeps loading white instead of green - Answer HQ
text:
Hi,
Is anyone else finding an issue in Switch Career mode?
The screen is intermittently loading white instead of green, which makes it impossible to play as you can't see the ball!
Once it has done it once, it does every load - we could only stop it by simming the match.
Totally frustrating, and no idea why it happens.
Please help!

author: Udbhavi Balakrishna
title: Intense evening showers in Bengaluru bring relief to citizens after hottest October day
text:
Bengaluru: Bengaluru received a spell of intense rainfall on Wednesday evening after recording its hottest October day, India Meteorological Department (IMD) data shows.

.

The maximum temperature of 32.8¬∞C recorded on Wednesday afternoon was followed by 20.7 mm of rainfall with thunder at night.

.

Wednesday's temperature was a deviation of over 4¬∞C from the normal. The city's mean daily maximum temperature for October is 28.2¬∞C.

.

Before this, the city's hottest October day was October 4, 2002, with 32.4¬∞C, according to IMD data.

.

The start of Navaratri has brought to Bengaluru the promise of generous amounts of rain.

.More low-pressure systems, no breaks drive above-normal monsoon rains in India.

The IMD's Meteorological Centre predicts that the city and nearby regions will see generally cloudy skies with a high likelihood of one or two spells of rain or thundershowers for the rest of this week, with temperatures stabilising at a minimum of 20¬∞C and a maximum of 29¬∞C over the next 48 hours.

.

The IMD predicts isolated moderate to heavy rainfall for the rest of this week in both Bengaluru Urban and Rural districts.

.

This is expected to provide some relief to the residents, as the city experienced its driest September since 1934, with just 23.9 mm of rainfall last month.

.

CS Patil, Director, IMD Bengaluru, noted that the southwest monsoon is expected to withdraw by October 15, while the normal date of the onset of northeast monsoon is October 20 for Karnataka. \"What we are seeing in the first week of October is normal southwest monsoon,\" he told DH.

.

While September's rainfall was in deficit, all other months saw excess rainfall across the state, but the distribution of rainfall was not uniform. \"Normal rainfall is likely in October, November and December over the state because of northeasterly winds,\" Patil added.

.

The city's mean total rainfall for October is 168.3 mm with 8.3 rainy days, as per the data.

author: Joanna Guill√©n Valera
title: Neuropat√≠a del nervio √≥ptico: as√≠ es la enfermedad que sufre Laura Matamoros y que podr√≠a dejarla ciega
text:
Neuropat√≠a del nervio √≥ptico: as√≠ es la enfermedad que sufre Laura Matamoros y que podr√≠a dejarla ciega
Este art√≠culo ha sido realizado y revisado para garantizar que la informaci√≥n sea lo m√°s rigurosa posible y cumpla los est√°ndares de calidad. Parte de estudios cient√≠ficos que tienen su propio proceso de validaci√≥n por parte de revistas especializadas en salud, fuentes confiables que son l√≠deres de opini√≥n de Sociedades Cient√≠ficas, Colegios Profesionales, Universidades y Hospitales de prestigio, entre otros. La informaci√≥n que encontrar√° a continuaci√≥n est√° acreditada en la bibliograf√≠a y en otras fuentes enlazadas en el texto.
[M√°s informaci√≥n](#)
Laura Matamoros fue diagnosticada en 2019 de una neuropat√≠a del nervio √≥ptico, igual que la enfermedad que sufe su padre y por la que podr√≠a perder la visi√≥n. Te contamos en qu√© consiste esta patolog√≠a y qu√© s√≠ntomas deben hacernos sospechar.
Actualizado a: Viernes, 22 Noviembre, 2024 07:04:04 CETLa neuropat√≠a del nervio √≥ptico es una condici√≥n que afecta al nervio √≥ptico, ‚Äúfundamental para la transmisi√≥n de informaci√≥n visual desde la retina hasta el cerebro. Esta patolog√≠a puede resultar en la p√©rdida de visi√≥n y se caracteriza por el da√±o o deterioro del nervio √≥ptico debido a diversas causas, como isquemia (falta de flujo sangu√≠neo), inflamaci√≥n, compresi√≥n por tumores, traumatismos o enfermedades autoinmunes‚Äù, explica en detalle [Andr√©s Fern√°ndez-Vega](https://fernandez-vega.com/equipo-medico/dr-andres-fernandez-vega-cueto-felgueroso/) Cueto-Felgueroso, especialista de la Unidad de Glaucoma del Instituto Oftalmol√≥gico Fern√°ndez-Vega.
Esta enfermedad se produce por diferentes factores que pueden da√±ar o deteriorar el nervio √≥ptico. Entre las causas m√°s comunes se encuentran ‚Äúla isquemia, una reducci√≥n en el flujo sangu√≠neo que priva al nervio de ox√≠geno y nutrientes; inflamaciones provocadas por enfermedades autoinmunes; compresi√≥n por tumores u otras masas que ejercen presi√≥n sobre el nervio; traumas f√≠sicos que da√±an el nervio; y ciertas infecciones o intoxicaciones‚Äù.
En algunos casos, a√±ade el experto, ‚Äúcondiciones como el glaucoma, asociado con un aumento de la presi√≥n intraocular, tambi√©n pueden llevar al desarrollo de neuropat√≠a √≥ptica‚Äù.
Esta presi√≥n elevada ‚Äúpuede causar una p√©rdida progresiva de las fibras nerviosas del nervio √≥ptico, llevando a una disminuci√≥n en el campo visual y, eventualmente, a la ceguera si no se trata adecuadamente‚Äù.
Qui√©nes tienen m√°s riesgo de sufrir una neuropat√≠a
En cuanto a qu√© personas tienen m√°s riesgo de sufrir este problema, Andr√©s Fern√°ndez-Vega Cueto-Felgueroso, ‚Äúlas personas con glaucoma tienen mayor riesgo de sufrir neuropat√≠a del nervio √≥ptico, ya que la presi√≥n intraocular elevada puede da√±arlo‚Äù. Adem√°s, ‚Äúpersonas con enfermedades cardiovasculares como hipertensi√≥n y diabetes, enfermedades autoinmunes y adultos mayores, tambi√©n est√°n en riesgo‚Äù. Por otro lado, a√±ade, ‚Äúel consumo de tabaco y alcohol tambi√©n puede incrementar la probabilidad de padecer esta patolog√≠a‚Äù.
El experto recuerda que esta condici√≥n no s√≥lo afecta a personas mayores sino que tambi√©n puede ‚Äúpresentarse en personas j√≥venes, aunque las causas tienden a ser diferentes de las que se observan en adultos mayores‚Äù.
En este caso las m√°s comunes son los ‚Äútraumas oculares, que se refieren a lesiones f√≠sicas en los ojos o en la cabeza que pueden da√±ar el nervio √≥ptico y un historial familiar de neuropat√≠a √≥ptica, infecciones que puedan inflamar el nervio √≥ptico y el consumo de sustancias t√≥xicas o ciertos medicamentos, que puedan causar da√±o en esta zona‚Äù.
S√≠ntomas de una neuropat√≠a del nervio √≥ptico
Los s√≠ntomas m√°s comunes son:
-
Visi√≥n borrosa o nublada
-
Dolor ocular,
-
P√©rdida de la percepci√≥n del color
-
Reducci√≥n del campo visual o p√©rdida de visi√≥n, que puede ser s√∫bita o progresiva.
La detecci√≥n y el diagn√≥stico de este problema visual ‚Äúse realiza a trav√©s de un examen de agudeza visual para determinar la claridad de la visi√≥n, pruebas de percepci√≥n del color y evaluaci√≥n del nervio √≥ptico‚Äù. Adem√°s, ‚Äúse pueden usar t√©cnicas como Tomograf√≠a de Coherencia √ìptica (OCT), que proporciona im√°genes detalladas de la retina y el nervio √≥ptico; y pruebas de imagen como la resonancia magn√©tica (RM) o la tomograf√≠a computarizada (TC). Adem√°s, se puede medir la presi√≥n intraocular si existen sospechas de glaucoma.
Cu√°l es el tratamiento
El tratamiento de la neuropat√≠a del nervio √≥ptico depende del origen. Por ejemplo, informa el experto, ‚Äúsi es causada por glaucoma, el tratamiento se enfoca en reducir la presi√≥n intraocular, generalmente mediante medicamentos, terapia l√°ser o cirug√≠a‚Äù.
En casos de ‚Äúneuritis √≥ptica asociada con enfermedades autoinmunes, se pueden utilizar corticosteroides para reducir la inflamaci√≥n y acelerar la recuperaci√≥n visual. Mientras que, en situaciones de neuropat√≠a √≥ptica t√≥xica, se debe identificar y eliminar la exposici√≥n a la toxina responsable‚Äù.
De igual forma, a√±ade, ‚Äúen todos los casos es necesario una detecci√≥n temprana y pautar un tratamiento oportuno para minimizar el da√±o al nervio √≥ptico y poder preservar la visi√≥n‚Äù.
¬øSe puede prevenir?
La prevenci√≥n de esta neuropat√≠a se enfoca principalmente en ‚Äúcontrolar los factores de riesgo y tratar las diferentes condiciones que pueden contribuir a su desarrollo‚Äù, explica.
